page.title: 03 supplies & vehicles
page.content: {harvest,often local students.Often {trainees work on the farms for 2-3 {weeks. { The soil is stony lightish to medium {loam.Supplies such as chemicals and {fertilisersare bought from 'Odams' of {Eye,Lincolnshire, or from Boston. { As for vehicles both have cars for {traveling and for farming: { Farm A) has { 6 tractors { 2 combine harvesters { 6 trailers {and a corndrill,spreader,loader,beet {harvester,and some bailers. { Farm B) has { 3 tractors { 1 combine harvester {and some hay implements,and trailers. { These highly mechanised farms also {have plenty of storage space:Farm A) {has 2 new Dutch barns whereas Farm B)
